Class Engine

java.lang.Object
org.scpre.runtime.engine.Engine
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEngine
public class Engine extends Object implements IEngine
A public class that represents the main heart of the engine

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static byte[]
    loadAnimationBytes(String anim)
    Get and return a byte sequence for type-based animations - This function is from IEngine
    static void
    writeAnimationBytes(String anim, AnimationType type)
    Write and set a byte sequence for a specific type-based animation - This function is from IEngine

    Types of animation:
    [PRE_CREATED] -> Pre-created animation (transform only);
    [PROCEDURAL] -> Procedural animation (events and response);
    [SKELETIC] -> Skeletic animation (skeleton only);

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • loadAnimationBytes

      public static byte[] loadAnimationBytes(String anim)
      Get and return a byte sequence for type-based animations - This function is from IEngine
      Parameters:
      anim - Animation name (ex: "ply_walk", "ply_jump")
      Returns:
      A byte blocks sequence (8 bits blocks)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when the name is invalid

    • writeAnimationBytes

      public static void writeAnimationBytes(String anim, AnimationType type)
      Write and set a byte sequence for a specific type-based animation - This function is from IEngine

      Types of animation:
      [PRE_CREATED] -> Pre-created animation (transform only);
      [PROCEDURAL] -> Procedural animation (events and response);
      [SKELETIC] -> Skeletic animation (skeleton only);
      Parameters:
      anim - Animation name (ex: "ply_walk", "ply_jump")
      type - The type of the type-based animation
